original_text: Please be patient with me! I am speaking like a fool. I know that you are being patient with me already!
korean_text: 원하건대 너희는 나의 좀 어리석은 것을 용납하라 청하건대 나를 용납하라

sentences.original_text: I am speaking like a fool.
that you are being patient with me already!
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 여러분이 저를 참아주고 있다는 것을!
